about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate full-stack engineer with extensive experience in web application development. I focus on building high-performance, scalable modern applications and am committed to delivering exceptional user experiences.
about.experience: In past projects, I have successfully delivered multiple large-scale enterprise applications across various domains including e-commerce, finance, and education. I excel at team collaboration, quickly adapt to new technologies, and maintain strict code quality standards.
